comet.agent.core.dialog_state_tracker package¶

Submodules¶

comet.agent.core.dialog_state_tracker.dialogue_state_tracker module¶

The DialogueStateTracker is the abstract parent class of all state trackers. It defines the interface that should be followed and owns all dialogue State updates. The Dialogue State Tracker should be the source of truth for the current dialogue State.

update_cv(cv_output)[source]¶

Update the result got from CV. There are 4 case from cv result case 1: Exactly id and object item

SLOT_OBJECT_TYPE: [“Coc”] SLOT_OBJECT_ID: [“1123”]

case 2: Multi possible object ids

SLOT_OBJECT_TYPE: None SLOT_OBJECT_ID: [“112”, “113”, “114”]

case 3: No id found, Give list of similarity of Object types

SLOT_OBJECT_TYPE: [“Coc”, “Ghe”] SLOT_OBJECT_ID: None

case 4: No any result

SLOT_OBJECT_TYPE: None SLOT_OBJECT_ID: None

Parameters

cv_output (Dict) –

Returns:

update_state(usr_acts, **kwargs)[source]¶

This update the internal state when receive the input from user. In this call back with deal with some default action such as: Agree, Deny, Thanks, Bye, Request
